title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 346.12 - Referral to authorized physician
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 346.12 - Referral to authorized physician

State Regulations

When the injury or condition is one outside of the limits
prescribed by the Education Law for chiropractic care and treatment, the
chiropractor must so advise the injured employee and instruct him to consult an
authorized physician, of said employee's choice, for appropriate care and
treatment. In such event the physician shall have overall
supervision. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
346.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
